name: Brook
text: On Play: Choose one: Put up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less into their trash. • Your opponent puts 3 cards from their trash to the bottom of their deck in any order.

effect.text: Choose one: Put up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less into their trash. • Your opponent puts 3 cards from their trash to the bottom of their deck in any order.
